ISSUE.TITLE: Nested fields query param does not respect '*' to include all fields
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I want to get all nested fields for the nested column table Since 0.90.10 it started to only return primary key and value for nested colums, f.e. `/api/v1/db/data/noco/AppName/SomeTable/8` returns ``` { <other data>, SomeNestedColumn: { id: 1, Name: 'name string', } } ``` Specifying fields directly does work, but is not practical for my use case, since we have a lot of columns and need all of them: `/api/v1/db/data/noco/AppName/SomeTable/8?nested[SomeNestedColumn][fields]=somefield,anotherfield` ``` { <other data>, SomeNestedColumn: { somefield: 'foo', anotherfield: 'bar', } } ``` I tried using '*' for it to return all fields but it returns the same as not specifying the fields param (only primary key and value): `/api/v1/db/data/noco/AppName/SomeTable/8?nested[SomeNestedColumn][fields]=*` ``` { <other data>, SomeNestedColumn: { id: 1, Name: 'name string', } } ``` I suspect this does code in #1856 does not handle the '*' case correctly: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/1856/files#diff-7768878066d19300f9872bc703464d8c2b7f2c79b747d9ee1fd9660805d97e17R48-R74 ``` Node: **v12.22.12** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.90.10** ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: if fields value specified as `*` extract all fields re #1981 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
